name: WordJumble
0:
”Alexa open word jumble.”
”Alexa launch word jumble.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: word jumble
des:
Have fun playing Word Jumble with Alexa!

In this game, Alexa will pick a mystery word and jumble up the letters. You will have three turns to guess the word. Each turn, you can either try to guess the word, or if you don't know the word yet, you can say "jumble" to mix up the letters again! You can also say, "I give up," if you want to move to the next word.

Alexa will keep track of your wins and losses and summarize your results at the end of the session. 

To begin the fun, simply say, "Alexa, open Word Jumble!"
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
